content: Reason Nethermind was forking should be fixed

author: parithosh

author: _shemnon
content:
In getting the testnet prepared we discovered (different) bugs in Geth and Nethermind around EIP-7698, the contract creation EIP.  In a great twist of irony this is one feature that the road map has us removing in testnet-2.

What are peoples opinions in moving TXCREATE from testnet-2 into testnet-1, and dropping EIP-7698?

author: _shemnon
content: That would move all breaking changes into the next testnet and make testnet-2 + into feature add only testnets.

author: _shemnon
content: Basically the argument is why fix and test code that we already plan to delete?

author: _shemnon
content: Also, I pushed a geth nonce fix for EIP-7698, can we get the geth nodes refreshed?

author: racytech
content: I am not sure if 2.1.0 tests are Pectra "aware", so I guess we want another fresh release

author: _shemnon
content: Also, I pushed a geth nonce fix for EIP-
